publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3545 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Meeting of the Parliamentâ€”That the Parliament agrees under Rules 2.2.4, 2.2.5 and 2.2.6(a) of the Standing Orders that the meeting of the Parliament on Wednesday 13 November 2002 may continue beyond 7.00 pm. Supported by: Euan Robson*
